description: Top 30 entities with refs for instant context recovery
Historical issues + solutions linked to entities

\"App freezes when clicking template in.problem: "App freezes when clicking template in flow page"
\"App freezes when clicking template in.solution: "isRightClickSelecting state was never reset to false - removed problematic state management"

\"Template blocks don't appear on canvas.problem: "Template blocks don't appear on canvas after click"
\"Template blocks don't appear on canvas.solution: "optimizeTemplateLayout was causing issues - disabled, using original hand-designed positions"

\"Right-click selection not working\".solution: "Changed from right-click to Shift+drag selection which is standard UX pattern"

\"Assets sidebar doesn't collapse when m.problem: "Assets sidebar doesn't collapse when maximizing RDP view"
\"Assets sidebar doesn't collapse when m.solution: "Added sidebarCollapsed state that toggles with fullscreen and manual button"

\"RDP display area not using full availa.problem: "RDP display area not using full available space"
\"RDP display area not using full availa.solution: "Removed padding from display container, used flex with minHeight:0 for proper sizing"

\"Fullscreen not using browser fullscree.solution: "Implemented requestFullscreen() API with fallback to CSS-based fullscreen"

\"RDP display not scaling up to fill con.problem: "RDP display not scaling up to fill container"
\"RDP display not scaling up to fill con.solution: "Removed scale cap of 1, allowing display to scale up when container is larger than remote resolution"

\"Headers visible in fullscreen taking u.problem: "Headers visible in fullscreen taking up space"
\"Headers visible in fullscreen taking u.solution: "Hide page header, tabs bar, and minimize connection status bar in fullscreen mode"

\"Clear All button fails on ARM (Radxa).problem: "Clear All button fails on ARM (Radxa) with generic error"
\"Clear All button fails on ARM (Radxa).solution: "Multiple potential ARM-specific issues addressed: 1) Added trailing slash fallback route for 307 redirect handling, 2) Added 60s timeout for slower ARM devices, 3) Improved error handling with full t

\"Changed parameters reverted when runni.solution: "Capture localParams at start of function before any state updates"

\"Saved changes lost on page refresh\".solution: "Added saveCurrentWorkflow() call to persist to backend API"

\"Port scan always showed same 5 ports r.problem: "Port scan always showed same 5 ports regardless of settings"

\"ForeignKeyViolationError: fk_credentia.solution: "Added credentials deletion before assets in delete_all_assets() - credentials have FK to assets table"

\"RDP/VNC area offset on resize - paddin.problem: "RDP/VNC area offset on resize - padding taking up space"
\"RDP/VNC area offset on resize - paddin.solution: "Removed p-6 padding in fullscreen mode, added minimal header"

\"No way to collapse assets sidebar in A.problem: "No way to collapse assets sidebar in Access page"
\"No way to collapse assets sidebar in A.solution: "Added resizable left sidebar with localStorage persistence"

fk_credentials_asset_id_assets`.solution: delete credentials before assets to avoid FK constraint violation

\"AKIS files had 18% duplication across.solution: "Single-source DRY - each rule in ONE file only"

\"Same TODO example repeated 4 times\".solution: "Keep 1 example in main file, reference elsewhere"

\"Clear all button returned 307 redirect.problem: "Clear all button returned 307 redirect in production"
\"Clear all button returned 307 redirect.solution: "Frontend used trailing slash '/assets/clear-all/' but backend route was '/clear-all' without slash. Removed slash from frontend service and added fallback route in backend."

\"guacd port 4822 conflicted with system.problem: "guacd port 4822 conflicted with system guacd service"
\"guacd port 4822 conflicted with system.solution: "Changed GUACD_PORT from 4822 to 14822 in all docker-compose files and Dockerfile configurations."

\"VNC connection required username field.problem: "VNC connection required username field but should be password-only"
\"VNC connection required username field.solution: "Added conditional in ProtocolConnection.tsx line 824: {tab.protocol !== 'vnc' && (... to hide username input for VNC protocol."

\"RDP connection established but immedia.solution: "xrdp was using security_layer=negotiate incompatible with guacd. Changed to security_layer=rdp and crypt_level=low in Dockerfile. Updated backend connection_args with security='rdp', color-depth='24'

\"Frontend rebuild not reflecting VNC us.problem: "Frontend rebuild not reflecting VNC username changes in browser"
\"Frontend rebuild not reflecting VNC us.solution: "Browser cache serving old JavaScript bundle. Rebuild completed (timestamp 14:17, hash 17eaef77), verified code in minified bundle. Needs hard refresh or cache clear to see changes."

** Frontend Assets page \"Clear All\" bu.problem: ** Frontend Assets page "Clear All" button returned 307 redirect in production.

** guacd on port 4822 conflicted with sy.problem: ** guacd on port 4822 conflicted with system guacd service.
** guacd on port 4822 conflicted with sy.solution: ** Changed all GUACD_PORT references from 4822 to 14822.

** VNC connection form required username.problem: ** VNC connection form required username field, but VNC protocol should only need password.
** VNC connection form required username.solution: ** Added conditional rendering to hide username field for VNC protocol.

** RDP connection established but immedi.problem: ** RDP connection established but immediately disconnected.

project_knowledge.json + skills/INDEX.md.solution: Context now pre-attached, no explicit reads needed
